name: DocumentTypeTest
description: Unit tests for the DocumentType class, focusing on constructor validation and HTML generation.

test_cases.name: constructorValidationOkWithBlankName
test_cases.description: Tests the DocumentType constructor with blank name, public ID, and system ID.

test_cases.name: constructorValidationThrowsExceptionOnNulls
test_cases.description: Tests that the DocumentType constructor throws an IllegalArgumentException when given null public and system IDs.

test_cases.name: constructorValidationOkWithBlankPublicAndSystemIds
test_cases.description: Tests the DocumentType constructor with a valid name and blank public and system IDs.

test_cases.name: outerHtmlGeneration
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of outer HTML for different DocumentType configurations.

test_cases.name: testRoundTrip
test_cases.description: Tests the round-trip parsing and generation of HTML for different DocumentType configurations.
